extra-projects.name: Mediportela
extra-projects.description: The client needed a website created from scratch, so that workers could insert house advertisements. It is also possible for the end user to contact the company directly when in a home item via a form. Wordpress configured on the server by me. And the design too!

extra-projects.name: App Despesas (Expenses App)
extra-projects.description: This idea came up after I noticed that Splitwise was now paid for, so I decided to look for a way to do this completely free, it was then that I discovered Google's Firebase. I had a very fixed idea of ​​using the React framework. I created a database model and created the various components to be able to connect to these tables. And this was the end result.
